snippet: The Mets had, and still have, high hopes for middle infielder Reese Havens, who has been dogged by injuries in recent seasons.
abstract: New York Mets still have high hopes for middle infielder Reese Havens, who has been dogged by injuries in recent seasons.

byline.original: By ANDREW KEH and BARRY MEIER

lead_paragraph: The Mets had, and still have, high hopes for middle infielder Reese Havens, who has been dogged by injuries in recent seasons.

headline.seo: Reese Havens, a Mets Prospect, Is Hounded by Injuries
headline.main: Mets Infield Prospect Hounded By a Perplexing Run of Injuries
headline.print_headline: Mets Infield Prospect Hounded By a Perplexing Run of Injuries
